data.title: Kamal Haasan: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Kamal Haasan: Check out the list of all Kamal Haasan movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Kamal Haasan news on Times of India.
data.text:
When ‘Indian 2’ star Kamal Haasan opened his heart about his love life and shared the reason behind his first divorce: “Things weren’t going well..”

etimes.in / Jul 12, 2024, 07:05 (IST)

Kamal Haasan, a cinema icon, faced professional and personal challenges. He married Vani Ganapathy in 1978 and divorced in 1988, then married Sarika Thakur and had daughters Shruti and Akshara before separating in 2004. In a Simi Garewal interview, he reflected on the pain of balancing his public persona and personal strife. His career remains inspirational, including 'Indian 2.'

Kill Box Office: Lakshya and Raghav Juyal starrer mints more than twice of Kamal Haasan’s Hindi collection on Wednesday

etimes.in / Jul 18, 2024, 12:47 (IST)

"Kill," starring Lakshya, Tanya Maniktala, and Raghav Juyal, is thriving in its second week, earning Rs 17.25 crore, and outperforming Kamal Haasan's "Indian 2" in Hindi collections. Directed by Nikhil Nagesh Bhat, the film may cross Rs 20 crore by the weekend, despite upcoming competition from Vicky Kaushal's "Bad Newz."

Kill Box Office: Lakshya and Raghav Juyal starrer beats Kamal Haasan’s Indian 2 on Monday, to collect Rs 65 lakh

etimes.in / Jul 16, 2024, 12:34 (IST)

Lakshya and Raghav Juyal's Kill, directed by Nikhil Nagesh Bhat, earned Rs 65 lakh on Monday, outperforming Kamal Haasan’s Indian 2 in Hindi. With a total of Rs 15.55 crore, Kill is set to cross Rs 20 crore. A Hollywood remake is in the works, with US earnings surpassing $1 million.

Is Kamal Haasan planning to make his comeback in Mollywood?

etimes.in / Jul 18, 2024, 11:14 (IST)

While promoting 'Indian 2' in Kerala, Kamal Haasan credited Malayalam cinema for his stardom, having done over 30 films there. Having acted in more than 250 films, he hinted at a Malayalam comeback. Fans are excited after 14 years since 'Four Friends', with speculation about collaborating with director Chidambaram amid social media buzz and multiple meetings.

Did you know Rajinikanth used Varma Kalai in films 7 years before Kamal Haasan?

etimes.in / Jul 21, 2024, 16:11 (IST)

Raijnikanth's figth sequence from 'Raja Chinna Roja' goes viral on social media as the Superstar actor spotted using a Varma Kalai. Fans praise Rajinikanth as the Varma Kalai introducer in films since Kamal Haasan's 'Indian' released in 7 years later to the film.

Has Vijay and H Vinoth watched Kamal Haasan's 'Indian 2' in a special screening?

etimes.in / Jul 21, 2024, 12:53 (IST)

Kamal Haasan's 'Indian 2', directed by Shankar, has released globally but hasn't met expectations. After a two-decade reunion, Vijay and H Vinoth were seen at a special screening with Jagadish Palanisamy, drawing major fan attention; fans clicked pictures. H Vinoth will direct Vijay’s last film, ‘Thalapathy 69’, before his political entry for the 2026 Tamil Nadu elections.

'Indian 2' box office collection day 9: Kamal Haasan's film jumps well on weekend

etimes.in / Jul 21, 2024, 10:56 (IST)

Shankar's Indian 2 starring Kamal Haasan has grossed Rs 149 crore. Released on July 12, the film earned Rs 4 crore in India and Rs 5-5.5 crore globally on day 9. Despite below-average reviews, its second-week numbers improved. Profitable from strong pre-release business, Indian 3 is planned in 6 months pending VFX completion.

Day out with Rakul Preet - the pictures say it all

IANS / Jul 20, 2024, 16:09 (IST)

Rakul Preet Singh shared 'shoot diaries' photos, showing her routine, vanity, makeup, and accessories. She wrote, 'A day in our life goes like this #shootdiaries.' Rakul starred in 'Indian 2' with Kamal Haasan, directed by S Shankar, and married Jackky Bhagnani on February 21, 2024, in Goa. She debuted in Kannada film 'Gilli.'

'Indian 2' box office collection day 8: Kamal Haasan starrer heads towards the 150-crore mark

etimes.in / Jul 20, 2024, 09:43 (IST)

Kamal Haasan's 'Indian 2', directed by Shankar, released on July 12. It grossed Rs 138 crore in the first week and Rs 3 crore on day 8 in India, totaling Rs 143 crore worldwide. Despite mixed reviews and screen losses, it surpassed Rs 50 crore in Tamil Nadu and stars Siddharth, Rakul Preet Singh, Bobby Simha, among others.

Bobby Simha blames critics for negative reviews of 'Indian 2'; netizens REACT

etimes.in / Jul 20, 2024, 01:50 (IST)

Actor Bobby Simha receives mixed reactions after defending 'Indian 2' against criticism. Fans debate his views on critics and audiences. Social media buzz surrounds his statements. 'Indian 3' expected in January 2025.

Here's how Shankar filmed late actor Vivek's portion in 'Indian 2'

etimes.in / Jul 19, 2024, 14:43 (IST)

'Indian 2', directed by Shankar, stars Kamal Haasan and employs AI with Kovai Babu for late actor Vivek's scenes. The sequel to 1996's 'Indian' includes Nedumudi Venu and Mano Bala. After over four years of production, it's successful. 'Indian 3' will explore Senapathy's flashback, featuring Vivek posthumously. Kovai Babu was pleased to join the project.

Sarfira box office collection week 1: Akshay Kumar starrer earns just over Rs 18 crore

etimes.in / Jul 19, 2024, 12:05 (IST)

Akshay Kumar's Sarfira, a remake of Tamil film Soorarai Pottru, earned Rs 18.80 crore in its first week. Despite strong weekend numbers, the film struggled during weekdays. It clashed with Kamal Haasan's Indian 2, which earned Rs 70 crore. Kumar's upcoming projects include Sky Force, Housefull 5, and Welcome to the Jungle.

'Thug Life' maker reveals why the film will be loved by fans!

etimes.in / Jul 19, 2024, 11:47 (IST)

Actor Kamal Haasan and director Mani Ratnam join forces again for 'Thug Life'. The film's shooting is in progress with a star-studded cast. Details about the plot are yet to be revealed. Excitement is building up among fans and the team as they work on the movie.

Bobby Simha upset over negative 'Indian 2' audience review; faces social media trolls

etimes.in / Jul 19, 2024, 11:14 (IST)

Actor Bobby Simha faces backlash for criticizing audience reviews of 'Indian 2'. Despite mixed reception, the film continues its theatrical run with over Rs 135 crore gross in 7 days. Directed by Shankar, the sequel features Kamal Haasan and a star-studded cast.

Indian 2 box office collection: Kamal Haasan starrer mints over Rs 70 crore in the first week

etimes.in / Jul 19, 2024, 11:06 (IST)

Indian 2, starring Kamal Haasan and directed by Shankar, earned Rs 70.45 crore in its first week despite negative reviews. The film, a sequel to the 1996 blockbuster Hindustani, struggled with weekday collections but plans to be part of a trilogy. Kamal Haasan's upcoming projects include Thug Life, Vikram 2, and Kalki 2.

Kalki 2898 AD' makers sue trade analysts on 'fake' boxoffice numbers!

etimes.in / Jul 19, 2024, 10:40 (IST)

The Telugu film 'Kalki 2898 AD' has achieved significant success, grossing over Rs 1000 crore worldwide in just 21 days. However, the producers have raised concerns about alleged fake box office numbers shared by trade analysts. Legal action may be taken if proper earnings breakdown is not provided. The film marks the beginning of the Kalki cinematic universe.

'Indian 2' box office collection day 7: Kamal Haasan starrer mints Rs 2 crore

etimes.in / Jul 19, 2024, 10:16 (IST)

The eagerly awaited sequel 'Indian 2,' starring Kamal Haasan and directed by Shankar, has seen a mixed performance in its first week. Despite high expectations, the film earned around Rs 2 crore on its seventh day, bringing its total to Rs 70.45 crore in India. The film is the sequel of the 1996 blockbuster 'Indian'.

Shruti Haasan shares UNSEEN photos with Kamal Haasan on Instagram with her fans - See inside

etimes.in / Jul 18, 2024, 23:16 (IST)

Shruti Haasan shares a sweet selfie with her father Kamal Haasan. Kamal's recent film 'Indian 2' receives mixed reviews, while Shruti is rumored to lend her voice for a song in Vijay Sethupathi's 'Train.' Exciting projects ahead for both father and daughter!
